item.title: Report E-2024090478
item.description:
Report E-2024090478

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-23T09:15:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-11
  • City: MILWAUKEE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On September 11, 2024, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN1993 was punctured by a forklift and released approximately fifty (50) gallons of product to the trailer interior and pavement beneath. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from SET Environmental (SET) to remediate the impacted site. SET placed granular absorbents to the asphalt surrounding the trailer. Granular absorbents were placed on the interior of the trailer, hand tools were used to retrieve all placed absorbents. All spent absorbents were collected and containerized into three (3) 55-gallon drums, the damaged product drum was placed into one (1) 95-gallon overpack.
